DOC.detailed_description: Panic disorder ( PD ) debilitate anxiety disorder . It characterize unexpected repeat episode intense fear , accompany serious physical symptom , chest pain , heart palpitation , shortness breath , dizziness , abdominal stress . Available treatment PD include medication therapy cognitive behavioral therapy ( CBT ) , type psychotherapy teach people view panic attack differently reduce anxiety . Approximately 30 % patient refuse medication , however , nearly 50 % achieve remission CBT alone . Therefore , press need additional non-pharmacologic treatment method . Panic-focused psychodynamic psychotherapy ( PFPP ) apply relaxation training ( ART ) among available treatment PD . During ART , individual teach relax muscle expose increasingly frightening situation . PFPP combine element CBT , extensive approach aim determine anxiety 's origin find way reduce . This study compare effectiveness PFPP , CBT , ART treat PD . Participants single blind study randomly assign receive PFPP , CBT , ART 12 week . All participant attend 19 24 treatment session course study . Upon complete study , participant attend monthly follow-up visit additional 12 month . Participants assign ART respond end treatment may opt receive PFPP CBT . Outcomes assess use variety scale determine depression anxiety symptom .
